name: Baccarat Web Game
description: Utilizing the Deck of Cards API, created a simple card game,

details.description: The user can select betting on the player, banker or tie. Once the user has made their decision, the scores of the player and banker will be displayed in the bottom square.

imageAlt: Baccarat web app before start game is initiated

name: Blackjack Web Game
description: Utilizing the Deck of Cards API, created a simple card game,

details.description: Refactored an existing component in order to allow the user to create custom placeholders in single line textbox.

imageAlt: Blackjack web app before start game is initiated.
